entries.@tip_default: Try again later. If the problem persists, please contact Player Support.
entries.@tip_type_login_error: Login error. Please try again later.
entries.@tip_type_profile_sync_error: Failed to synchronize profile from the server.
entries.@tip_type_inventory_sync_error: Failed to synchronize inventory from the server.
entries.@tip_type_quickplay_service_timeout: No match found. Please try again or change game mode.
entries.@tip_type_purchase_error: Failed to complete purchase request. Please try again later.
entries.@tip_type_server_connection_error: Failed to connect to the server.
entries.@tip_detail_not_enough_money: Sorry, you don't have enough funds.
entries.@tip_detail_closed_for_maintenance: Sorry, the servers are down for maintenance.
entries.@tip_detail_eac_failed_to_init: Anticheat system failed to initialize. Please try to repair it.
entries.@tip_detail_ds_allocation_failed: No available servers left, please try again later.
entries.@tip_detail_matchmaking_failed: Matchmaking failed, please try again later.
entries.@tip_detail_territories_not_specified: Incorrect server region. Please change the region in the Lobby.
entries.@tip_detail_not_party_leader: You are not the party leader.
entries.@tip_detail_already_in_party: You are already in the party.
entries.@tip_detail_craft_reward_invalid: Sorry, invalid reward received. Please contact Player Support.
entries.@tip_season_paid_track_already_unlocked: Premium Season track is already unlocked.
entries.@tip_support_unavailable: Support service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
entries.@tip_ticket_not_created: Error while creating support ticket. Please try again later.
entries.@tip_need_to_enable_steam_overlay: Please enable the in-game Steam overlay in your Steam settings to proceed.
entries.@tip_login_queue_full: Login queue is full. Please try again in a few minutes.
entries.@tip_eos_restricted_game_access: Access to the game was restricted.
entries.@tip_eos_cannot_load_sanctions: Error while loading sanctions list. Please try again.
entries.@tip_steam_init_failed: Please relaunch the game through Steam.
entries.@tip_steam_token_error: Please make sure Steam is in Online mode. Please try again.
entries.@tip_sync_entitlements_failed: We failed to sync your purchase. We will try again with your next purchase or next login.
entries.@tip_authentication_forbidden_no_privile: The servers are closed for maintenance.
entries.@tip_egs_token_error: Please make sure Epic Games Launcher is in Online mode. Try again.
entries.@tip_not_enough_consumed_items: Not enough consumable items to continue operation.
entries.@tip_eos_jwt_verification_error: EOS Identity Provider not responding. Please contact live support.
entries.@tip_detail_qos_limit_reached: Oops, we are trying to send too many requests. Please report this issue.
